nodes.text: A card game was played on Ord Mantell early in the Imperial Era. Played with dark blue eight-sided cards with orange and grey markings, the card game could be played for credits. After Cid's Parlor was taken over by the criminal Roland Durand, Cid and her regular patrons Ketch and Bolo retreated to the Havoc Marauder, and Ketch and Bolo played the game using the GNK-series power droid Gonky as a table while waiting for the starship's owners to show up.
The card game first appeared in the Star Wars: The Bad Batch episode "Infested". The StarWars.com episode guide identified it as a brand-new game created for the episode.
